divs: Sighting DetailsI was in hot tub with my sister in law I looked up and saw craft and showed her others near us mised it due to trees I know what I saw and so dose she we were close to camp grayling air force base
Summary: Large white glowing triangle three round balls connected tubes with triangle in center balls were brighter than tubes and center less bright than tubes
